item.title: SAE Supermileage: An Enduring Technical Challenge
item.description: How far can you go on a litre of gasoline? After 43 years, the SAE Supermileage Competition came to a close in June 2022. To hear the end of a program that shaped much of my undergraduate experience left me reminiscingâ€”of late nights hacking together prototype vehicles with fellow students all enchanted by the madness of collegiate engineering competitions. I was supposed to compete in 2020 as team captain of the UBC Supermileage team, but lost the opportunity due to the pandemic.
